title.zh: 北京：第六届罕见病合作交流会
title.en: Beijing: Sixth Rare Disease Cooperation and Exchange Conference

subtitle.zh: 北京罕见病公益交流学习
subtitle.en: Beijing Rare Disease Public Welfare Exchange and Learning

description.zh: 第六届罕见病合作交流会在北京成功举办，由北京病痛挑战公益基金会主办，中国罕见病联盟作为指导单位。南昌市血之友公益协会的左国良、左钰洁前往北京参与学习交流，深入了解罕见病公益事业的发展趋势和最佳实践，为罕见病关爱工作积累宝贵经验。
description.en: The Sixth Rare Disease Cooperation and Exchange Conference was successfully held in Beijing, hosted by the Beijing Illness Challenge Foundation with the China Alliance for Rare Diseases as the guiding organization. Zuo Guoliang and Yujie (Ruby) Zuo from Nanchang Hemophilia Association traveled to Beijing to participate in learning and exchange, gaining deep insights into the development trends and best practices of rare disease public welfare, accumulating valuable experience for hemophilia women's care work.
